column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went to Ba-Ba-Reeba only once
column2: and I can't wait to go back again. Their sangria is SO GOOD
column3: and their tapas even better. It's a great setting to go with a group of 5 or more
column4: wouldn't recommend it for tables of 2. I had bacon wrapped dates
column9: and I don't have a complaint. Our server was super friendly and helpful with recommendations -- and my water was never empty. I remember the restaurant being a little loud
column10: but that was just because it was so busy.
